text: geunal geubunkkeseoneun jibhab-ui nal-eul wihae geudaedeul-eul mo-eusil geos-ini geu nal-eun deugsil-ui nal-ila. hananim-eul midgo seonhaeng-eul silcheonhaneun jaga issdamyeon geubunkkeseoneun geuui aghaeng-eul yongseohae jusil geos-imyeo geuleul cheongug-e deulge hasil geos-ini geu alaelobuteoneun gang-i heuleumyeo geudeul-eun geu an-eseo yeong-wonhi meomul geos-ila. igeos-iyamallo widaehan seong-gong-ila
